title: How to Make Mushroom Chips

steps.headline: Use about half a pound (250 grams) oyster mushrooms.
Separate each mushroom from the bunch and shred any larger mushrooms into smaller pieces with your hands.
Place mushrooms in a plastic/zip log bag and add 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 teaspoon thyme, half a teaspoon fine salt and 2 tablespoons flour (use corn flour for gluten-free option).
steps.description: Close the bag and shake well to coat.

steps.headline: Transfer mushrooms in a single layer to a baking pan lined with baking paper.
Bake in a preheated oven at 350 ℉ (175 ℃) for about an hour or until very crispy.
Eat immediately or cool completely on a rack and store in an airtight container for up to 2-3 days.
